de.jannlab.tools

Class DefaultNetTrainerListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.jannlab.tools.DefaultNetTrainerListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetTrainerListener

    public final class DefaultNetTrainerListener
extends Object
implements NetTrainerListener
    This class implements a standard NetTrainerListener, which just prints out the validation error over time.

    Author:
    Sebastian Otte
